requirement.description: The CashFlow plug-in shall allow support for user-defined instructions for controlling the execution stages of the economical analysis.
The CashFlow plug-in shall allow for user-defined output types for simulation data.
The CashFlow plug-in shall support the computation of Net Present Value (NPV).
The CashFlow plug-in shall support the computation of Internal Rate of Return (IRR).
The CashFlow plug-in shall support the computation of Profitability Index (PI).
The CashFlow plug-in shall support the computation of a multiplicative factor so that the Net Present Value (NPV) has a desired value.
The CashFlow plug-in shall be able to be run in standalone.
The CashFlow plug-in shall be able to be executed in parallel via RAVEN
The CashFlow plug-in shall be able to be initialized via input files.
